text: DOCTOR: It’s like a pattern with you!

text: DOCTOR: Okay? And, chances we are going to have to put you on a medication called Zytiga.
DOCTOR: Okay. This is a pill. These are pills that have a very good chance of working against the cancer.
DOCTOR: And they will likely shrink the disease and, you know, also lower the PSA, and the good thing is they are likely to work for long periods of time.

DOCTOR: But, the possibility of side effects is a little bit higher. Okay? And usually, those side effects are high blood pressure, leg swelling, low potassium.
